アートに国境はない en art, point de frontière

I AM A FRENCH/JAPANESE SELF-TAUGHT WEB DEVELOPER. FORMER GAME DESIGNER THAT STUDIED AT DIGIPEN SINGAPORE, I TRIED WEB DEVELOPMENT LESS THAN A YEAR AGO JUST BY CURIOSITY AND FELL TOTALLY IN LOVE WITH IT AND HOW CREATIVE YOU CAN GET.

FOR THOSE REASONS, I STARTED THE FRENCH "OPENCLASSROOMS" BOOTCAMP, AND DECIDED TO PUSH MY TOOLKIT BY LEARNING THREEJS, THURFORE PUSHING THE BOUNDARIES OF THE APPLIANCE OF MY CREATIVITY.

私の他のスキル

I use React as my main framework but I also feel really confortable using only vanilla js. And webgl for artistic parts.

I am familiar with node js and mongoDB, data modelling, error handling and advanced features (email, file uploads, payments...)

Blender to create my Threejs assets. Illustrator to create my SVGs. After effects for my frame by frame animations. SEO.

私のさまざまなスキル mes compétences

My goal is to give the best possible experience by providing a piece of art that fit the requisites that I received. 私の目標は、頂いた要件に適合する芸術作品を提供し、最高の体験を提供することです。
